flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Tools
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • Origami Paper
  • Pipe Cleaners - optional

lines.text: The 3 pictures show variations of what you can do with these directions.
lines.text_raw: The 3 pictures show variations of what you can do with these directions.

lines.text: You will need 5 pieces of paper.
lines.text_raw: You will need 5 pieces of paper.

lines.text: Start with color side down.
lines.text_raw: Start with color side down.

lines.text: Fold in half on the diagonal.
lines.text_raw: Fold in half on the diagonal.

lines.text: Fold side points to the top.
lines.text_raw: Fold side points to the top.

lines.text: Repeat on other side.
lines.text_raw: Repeat on other side.

lines.text: Fold back along the crease. Long side of triangle will fold back along the outside crease.
lines.text_raw: Fold back along the crease. Long side of triangle will fold back along the outside crease.

lines.text: Repeat on both sides.
lines.text_raw: Repeat on both sides.

lines.text: Unfold the last fold.
lines.text_raw: Unfold the last fold.

lines.text: You may need to use your finger to help with the "squash" fold. (Picture #2)
lines.text_raw: You may need to use your finger to help with the "squash" fold. (Picture #2)

lines.text: Repeat on both sides.
lines.text_raw: Repeat on both sides.

lines.text: Fold back the point. You will want to fold down so it's even with the paper. (Picture #3)
lines.text_raw: Fold back the point. You will want to fold down so it's even with the paper. (Picture #3)

lines.text: Open up the unit.
lines.text_raw: Open up the unit.

lines.text: Fold in the 2 points on the left and right.
lines.text_raw: Fold in the 2 points on the left and right.

lines.text: Refold the unit.
lines.text_raw: Refold the unit.

lines.text: Fold along the crease.
lines.text_raw: Fold along the crease.

lines.text: You will need a glue gun. I've used sticky dots, but they don't hold over time.
lines.text_raw: You will need a glue gun. I've used sticky dots, but they don't hold over time.

lines.text: Put glue on the outside flap, and roll them together. (Picture #2)
lines.text_raw: Put glue on the outside flap, and roll them together. (Picture #2)

lines.text: Make a total of 5.
lines.text_raw: Make a total of 5.

lines.text: Glue together as shown.
lines.text_raw: Glue together as shown.

lines.text: If you want to add a stem, a pipe cleaner works well. Stick it in after the 3rd petal.
lines.text_raw: If you want to add a stem, a pipe cleaner works well. Stick it in after the 3rd petal.

lines.text: There you have it. A beautiful flower.
lines.text_raw: There you have it. A beautiful flower.

lines.text: Remember the pictures at the beginning of this guide? The possibilities are endless.
lines.text_raw: Remember the pictures at the beginning of this guide? The possibilities are endless.

lines.text: Have fun!
lines.text_raw: Have fun!

guide.summary: Make an origami flower, and if you wish, an origami ball.
guide.title: Origami Five-Petal Flower
